decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (BH/1263/15; BH/1262/15 Rev A; drwg 13 rev B; Design and Access Statement; Received: 30/11/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - Within 3 months of the date of this decision the building hereby approved shall be painted into very dark green or dark grey and shall then be maintained in that colour thereafter.

Condition : 3 - Within 9 months of the date of this decision, the landscaping plan BH/1262/15 Rev A shall be implemented complying with the requirements specified in BS 3936 (1992) 'Specification of Nursery Stock Part 1 Trees and Shrubs' and in BS 4428 (1989) 'Recommendations for General Landscape Operations'. None of the new trees, and/or shrubs planted shall be lopped or topped within a period of five years from the completion of this planting; and if they die, removed, or become seriously damaged or diseased shall be replaced in the next planting season, in accordance with the approved scheme. The approved landscaping scheme shall be maintained thereafter.
Condition : 4 - The coach workshop hereby approved, shall only be used for purposes ancillary to the adjacent coach park and shall not become a separate use at any time.
